bf.gamemode.boot.description: 通過官方培訓課程學習遊戲的基礎知識！
bf.gamemode.dom.description: With your team, capture as many control points as possible to Win. The team with the most points wins!
bf.gamemode.ffa.description: 在有限的時間和最高分數的情況下，您必須殺死匹配賽中的所有其他玩家才能獲勝！
bf.gamemode.gg.description: 每次擊殺後升級你的武器。頻繁的死亡會減少你的計數，第一個達到最高等級武器的玩家獲勝！
bf.gamemode.inf.description: 你和你的戰友們必須戰勝永無止境的不死族浪潮！
bf.gamemode.sg.description: Survive in the wasteland amongst other well trained soldiers. Become the last survivor to win!
bf.gamemode.tdm.description: 在有限的時間和最高分數的情況下，你必須在被殺之前殺死其他團隊的所有玩家！
bf.gamemode.ttt.description: There are traitors hiding amongst us! We must eliminate them before they eliminate us!

bf.message.gamemode.class.assault.desc: Effective in close-quarters combat, equipped with effective close-range weaponry

bf.message.gamemode.class.sniper.desc: Effective in long-range combat, giving support to fellow soldiers, or calling out enemy advancements
bf.message.gamemode.class.specialist.des: Effective in mid-range combat. Commonly uses a combination of flanking and tactical advancements
bf.message.gamemode.class.support.desc: 有效提高機動性，同時為戰友保持高火力支援

bf.screen.menu.intro.ww2.part1: On §7September 1st§f, §71939§f, a conflict would begin that involved a vast majority of the world's nations.
bf.screen.menu.intro.ww2.part2: Throughout the next §7six years§f, the conflict would take more lives than any previous war.
bf.screen.menu.intro.ww2.part3: It is the §cdeadliest and most destructive conflict §fin human history.
bf.settings.audio.bots.desc: 確定機器人語音線路是否應該播放。
bf.settings.audio.vc.enable.desc: Allow yourself to hear other players that have voice chat enabled.
bf.settings.audio.vc.volume.receive.desc: The volume in which you receive voice from other players.
bf.settings.audio.vc.volume.send.desc: The volume in which your voice is sent to other players.
bf.settings.crosshair.alpha.desc: Amount of alpha applied to crosshair while rendering.
bf.settings.crosshair.dynamic.desc: Alter crosshair position depending on player motion.
bf.settings.crosshair.hitmarker.desc: Render the crosshair hit marker when target hit.
bf.settings.crosshair.name: Crosshair
bf.settings.crosshair.render.aiming.desc: Render the crosshair while aiming a weapon
bf.settings.crosshair.scope.sens.desc: Amount of sensitivity deducted while scoped.
bf.settings.crosshair.static.desc: Prevents crosshair lines from moving with spread.
bf.settings.experimental.bullet.holes.de: Render bullet holes on impacted blocks. Not recommended for low-end systems.
bf.settings.experimental.toggle.aim.desc: Determines whether aim should toggle by single or held right-clicking.
Toggles a very experimental bobbing effect for the players camera.
bf.settings.experimental.toggle.gore.des: 確定是否渲染血腥效果。
bf.settings.experimental.toggle.muzzlefl: Toggles the muzzle flash effect while shooting a weapon.
bf.settings.experimental.toggle.nametags: 決定玩家名稱標簽是否顯示。
bf.settings.privacy.friend.discord.rp.de: Display your in-game status via your Discord profile.
bf.settings.privacy.friend.requests.desc: Allow other players to send you a friend request.
bf.settings.privacy.profile.desc: Allow other players to view your profile.
bf.settings.save.prompt.message: Please save or discard your unsaved changes!
bf.settings.save.prompt.title: Unsaved Changes
bf.settings.ui.constant.hotbar.desc: Keep the hotbar display shown rather than between switching items.
bf.settings.ui.render.compass.desc: Determines whether compass renders while in a match.
bf.settings.ui.render.hud.desc: Determines whether HUD renders while in a match.
bf.settings.ui.render.minimap.desc: Determines whether minimap renders while in a match.

bf.settings.ui.render.blur.desc: 確定迷霧效果是否呈現在某些地方的後面。
